title: manap-poruttamE
sahitya:
manap-poruttamE pOdum jAti matha bhEdam vIN vAdam en kAdalA


anupallavi

  dinakara kiraNam pOr-sErndunnaip-piriyAmal cittam vaittennai ALAi deiva shikhAmaNiyE


caraNam    pUmAlai pugazh mAlai pon mAlai vENDilEn pUn-tamizh shOlaiyil tIn-tamizh malargaLin
pAmAlai shUTTi en paramA enrunnai bhatti shei uLLattil vaittu sukhittiDavE
